attributes.action: make pick-up and drop-off zones free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On some airports users must pay even for using frop-off facility [i.e. Luton Airport].

Drop-off should be free of charge - airport taxes payed by travellers are so hige and this is just another way to rip people off their hard earned money!
